about_the_game:
Let Shadow sneak up on your enemies and take them out quickly and quietly.
Downloading the Shadow Pack will add an elite version of Shadow to your team permanently and save you valuable in game cash by skipping the cost for hiring and upkeep. Employ Shadow's superior stealth ability to your team and dish out deadly damage!

The Shadow Pack allows you to:

  • Get this exclusive Elite Commando mercenary
  • Save massively on contract-fees as Shadow joins your company permanently!
  • Get his merc-slot for FREE on top!

Shadow C.v.

This ex-ranger has turned stalking into an art form. The Shadow could be lurking about right next to you and you'd probably never know it. That snow drift, sand dune or piece of shrubbery could be him. True to his name, The Shadow had vanished for the last decade...

This ex-ranger has turned stalking into an art form. The Shadow could be lurking about right next to you and you'd probably never know it. That snow drift, sand dune or piece of shrubbery could be him. True to his name, The Shadow had vanished for the last decade...

name: Jagged Alliance Online: Reloaded - Shadow

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows Vista/7/8 or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo, 1,8 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9-compatible graphics card with at least 64MB of video memory
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires permanent internet connection to play!
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows Vista/Windows 7/Windows 8 or newer
  • Processor: 2+ GHz or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9-compatible graphics card with at least 64MB of video memory
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires permanent internet connection to play!

Employ Shadows superior stealth ability to your team and dish out deadly damage!
supported_languages:
English*, German, Russian*
*languages with full audio support
